column1: The Purple Pig////My group shared three dishes: Chicken and Waffles
column3: and French omelette. The omelette was expected
column4: but excellent. A solid dish! The surprise was the Avocado Toast Â which was a guacamole with the acid coming from the olives and cucumbers. It was a weird combo
column5: but it worked! The chicken and waffles were the best I've ever had! The waffle was more savory than sweet which I loved. The chicken was pretty epic too!
